document_data.name: Order of the Golden Coin
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Order of the Golden Coin''' was an all-female martial order of [[Cleric|priestesses]] dedicated to the goddess [[Nephthys]] of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]], active around [[1370 DR]].

Known for their vigilance, they worked as temple guards, caravan escorts, and bodyguards. They were quite skilled at dissuading criminals, although their fee was considerable.
